metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42376 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in Busybox's hush applet leads to denial of service when processing a crafted shell command, due to missing validation after a \x03 delimiter character. This may be used for DoS under very rare conditions of filtered command input.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hush is not build in Ubuntu packages.

criterions.comment: busybox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
